original_text: Their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
korean_text: 그 소제와 전제는 수송아지와 숫양과 어린 양의 수효를 따라 규례대로 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Their meat offering and their drink offerings
for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs,
sentences.korean_translation: 수소를 위하여, 수양을 위하여, 그리고 어린 양을 위하여,

sentences.original_text: shall be according to their number,
